mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CARTS (CART_ID,PRODUCT_ID,CART_AMOUNT, CART_OPTION,CART_PRICE,MEMBER_ID) VALUES ('CT'||TO_CHAR(CT_SEQ.NEXTVAL), #{productId},#{cartAmount},#{cartOption}, (SELECT PRICE FROM PRODUCTS WHERE PRODUCT_ID=#{productId}) ,#{memberId})
mapper.select: SELECT P.PRODUCT_ID,P.PRODUCT_NAME,P.DELIVERY_FEE,P.PRICE AS CART_PRICE, C.CART_AMOUNT,C.CART_OPTION,M.FILE_ROUTE,M.MEDIA_NAME FROM PRODUCTS P,CARTS C,MEDIA M WHERE P.PRODUCT_ID = C.PRODUCT_ID AND C.PRODUCT_ID=M.GROUP_ID AND C.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND M.SUB_GROUP='대표이미지' GROUP BY P.PRODUCT_ID,P.PRODUCT_NAME,P.DELIVERY_FEE,P.PRICE, C.CART_AMOUNT, C.CART_OPTION,M.FILE_ROUTE,M.MEDIA_NAME

delete.if: DELETE FROM CARTS WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{productId} AND CART_OPTION IS NULL AND CART_AMOUNT=#{cartAmount} AND MEMBER_ID =#{memberId}
DELETE FROM CARTS WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{productId} AND CART_OPTION = #{cartOption} AND CART_AMOUNT=#{cartAmount} AND MEMBER_ID =#{memberId}
